text:
L O R E N  S H E V I T Z
OBJECTIVE
To help people make the best decisions in their process of making
a spiritual journey by moving to Israel.
JEWISH EXPERIENCE
2008-present Anshe Emet Synagogue ( ansheemet.org)
Chicago, IL
Music Teacher
Teach Jewish and Israeli music to children ranging from junior
kindergarten through 4th grade.
Have  also  worked  at  other  synagogues  teaching  music  and
Hebrew
Professional High Holy Day Choir
Sing in the professional High Holy Day Choir for services
Young Adult Division (2001-present)
Lead services occasionally, attend and help plan activities
1994-95Project Otzma (www.projectotzma.org )All across 
Israel
Volunteer: Kibbutz, Immigrant Absorption Centers., Livnot 
U’lehibanot, Gadna, educational seminars
Taught  English  to  native  Israeli  and  immigrant  children  and
teenagers
Spoke Hebrew extensively, especially during 2-3 month stays
each  in  Ashdod  and  Nazareth  Illit  where  little  English  was
spoken
Worked with a psychologist on a study in learning motivation
between Russian olim and sabras
Participated in gadna for a week
Did Livnot for 3 weeks in Jerusalem and Tzfat
Travelled around the country for work and pleasure
Was assigned to an “adoptive family” in Yehud; spent time there
during vacation
2005Congregation Solel Highland Park, IL
Choir Director
Directed  Adult  Choir for  Shabbat,  holiday,  and Days  of  Awe
F A X  ( 7 7 3 )  8 2 9 - 4 4 5 9  •  E - M A I L  L O R E N @ S H E V I T Z . O R G

Prepared  music  and  distributed  it  electronically  to  choir
members
1996-present Shircago (www.shircago.com )
Chicago, IL
Founder, Director
Research, select, and arrange music to perform in a cappella
style
Teach music and run rehearsals
Produced three albums
Selected for first-ever Best of Jewish A Cappella (BOJAC) album
(www.bojac.org)
Two-time  National  Quarterfinalist  for  Harmony  Sweepstakes
(www.harmony-sweeps.com )
1996-2002Newberger Hillel Center Chicago, IL
Coffeehouse series
Created a series of variety shows featuring talent throughout
Chicago
Emceed & performed in shows
Reform Chavurah
Periodic music leader in Shabbat services
1993-94Hillel University of Michigan
Reform Chavurah
Led services; coordinated music
OTHER EXPERIENCE
2003-presentVarious Retirement Homes & Senior Centers
Chicagoland
Entertainer
Sing and play piano for Chicagoland’s elderly
EDUCATION
1996-2002University of Chicago Chicago, IL
M.S., Computer Science.
Also studied Social Sciences & Music
1990-94University of Michigan Ann Arbor, MI

Affirmation

MISC.

Member of Mensa
